1 . He meant that the people and lifestyles / standard of living of Spanish Harlem are completely or distinctly different from that of typical Manhattan/New York (which is a higher class/more affluent section of the city.)

	 

	2 . He meant that there is a wide disparity between the people and lifestyles / standard of living of Spanish Harlem from that of typical Manhattan/New York (which is a higher class/more affluent section of the city.)
